name: Counter Hero
description:
Controls

Arrow Keys: Move and Turn

F: Shoot Laser Pointer

Esc: Pause and Restart Level Screen

In a world where the enemy has taken over and normal rules of combat have ceased to exist. The Counter Hero is deployed to kill them all and take back what's rightfully ours.

Unique Puzzle game where pickups don't work the way they should.
Goal is to kill all enemies in each level but that too doesn't work the way it should. You have to find ways to make the enemies kill themselves.

Try playing game once first before looking at the hints below:

1.If you are facing an enemy and press f he will face you and move 1 step towards you

2. If either the player or the enemy steps on the gun pick up all enemies will shoot towards the direction they are facing

3. You can use portals and so can the enemies

All art assets and entire code has been made by myself.
Music from Freesounds.org
